abstract: Three writers with backgrounds on Wall Street blur the line between reality and fiction with several new thrillers. DealBook’s Kevin Roose brings the writers together for a roundtable discussion about whether a novel can hold a candle to the real drama of the Street.
snippet: Three writers with backgrounds on Wall Street blur the line between reality and fiction with several new thrillers. DealBook’s Kevin Roose brings the writers together for a roundtable discussion about whether a novel can hold a candle to the real ...
lead_paragraph: Three writers with backgrounds on Wall Street blur the line between reality and fiction with thrillers set in the world of high finance. DealBook’s Kevin Roose brings together the writers — David T. Lender, H.T. Narea and Norb Vonnegut — for a roundtable discussion about whether a novel can hold a candle to the real drama of the Street.

headline.main: Writing on Wall Street (Car Chase Optional)
